doc.field: Subseries XIII.2 - Photographs of City Facilities, Programs and Services, and Special Events
Sub-Subseries XIII.2.B - Photographs of Unidentifed CAS City Facilities
Subseries XIII.2 - Photographs of City Facilities, Programs and Services, and Special Events
Sub-Subseries XIII.2.B - Photographs of Unidentifed CAS City Facilities

Crippled Children - Horse-drawn wagonette (ca. 1913) and bus (began operating 1916) for crippled children. [Henrietta, Rhinelander, and Avenue B Schools all served crippled children - these children are probably going to Rhinelander] - 1 print by Brown & Dawson, 1 print, duplicate, and reprint by A. Tennyson Beals

Crippled Children - Horse-drawn wagonette (ca. 1913) and bus (began operating 1916) for crippled children. [Henrietta, Rhinelander, and Avenue B Schools all served crippled children - these children are probably going to Rhinelander] - 1 print by Brown & Dawson, 1 print, duplicate, and reprint by A. Tennyson Beals
